languages.text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.
languages.original_text: Поборник веры и его союзники в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g} Боевого гимна или Яростного выступления наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночными{/g} выстрелами и {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаками по возможности{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

The Ministorum priest and their allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of War Hymn gain +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The devotee and their allies in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of War Hymn or Furious Recital gain +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

languages.text: Setzt der Priester des Ministorum {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} oder {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} ein, verursachen der Priester selbst und seine Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Feldern 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} mehr Waffenschaden. Dieser Bonus wird gegen Dämonen, Psioniker und Xenos verdoppelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Priester des Ministorum {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} oder {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} ein, verursachen der Priester selbst und seine Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Feldern 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} mehr Waffenschaden. Dieser Bonus wird gegen Dämonen, Psioniker und Xenos verdoppelt.

Der Priester des Ministorum und seine Verbündeten im Wirkungsbereich von Kriegshymne erhalten 1 Runde lang +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} Schaden auf Einzelschüsse und Gelegenheitsangriffe.

languages.text: Lorsque le prêtre du Ministorum utilise {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} ou {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g}, ses armes et celles de ses alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} points de dégâts supplémentaires pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Ce bonus est doublé contre les démons, les psykers et les xénos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le prêtre du Ministorum utilise {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} ou {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g}, ses armes et celles de ses alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} points de dégâts supplémentaires pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Ce bonus est doublé contre les démons, les psykers et les xénos.

Le prêtre du Ministorum et les alliés de celui-ci présents dans la zone d'effet d'Hymne de guerre bénéficient de +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} points de dégâts pour les attaques au coup par coup et les attaques d'opportunité pendant 1 round.

languages.text: 每当国教牧师使用{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}或{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}时，国教牧师本人与距离5格内所有盟友的武器伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。对抗恶魔、灵能者、异形时，此加成效果翻倍。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: 每当国教牧师使用{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}或{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}时，国教牧师本人与距离5格内所有盟友的武器伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}点，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。对抗恶魔、灵能者、异形时，此加成效果翻倍。

受战争礼赞{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}{/g}影响的国教牧师与盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}会造成额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，伤害加成等同于{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el sacerdote del Ministorum usa {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} o {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g}, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el sacerdote y sus aliados en un radio de 5 casillas infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} de daño de arma adicional. Esta bonificación se duplica contra daemons, psíquicos y xenos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el sacerdote del Ministorum usa {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} o {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g}, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el sacerdote y sus aliados en un radio de 5 casillas infligen +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} de daño de arma adicional. Esta bonificación se duplica contra daemons, psíquicos y xenos.

El sacerdote del Ministorum y los aliados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de Himno de guerra ganan +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} para ataques de un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}solo disparo{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}oportunidad{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

El devoto y los aliados en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de Himno de guerra o Recital furioso ganan +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} para ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}oportunidad{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: プリーストが{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}戦の聖歌{/g}または{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}怒りのリサイタル{/g}を使用するたび、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、プリースト自身と5セル以内の味方は+{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}の武器ダメージを与える。このボーナスはデーモン、異能者、ゼノに対して2倍になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: 戦の聖歌またはの{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲内{/g}の信者とその味方は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}増加する。

戦の聖歌の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲内{/g}のミニストルム・プリーストとその味方は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe}増加する。

languages.text: Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, он сам и все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} к урону оружием на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, он сам и все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} к урону оружием на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.
Священник Адептус Министорум и его союзники в области действия Боевого гимна наносят на (бонус ВОЛ священника / 2) больше урона одиночными выстрелами и атаками по возможности в течение 1 раунда.

Священник Адептус Министорум и его союзники в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g} Боевого гимна наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночными выстрелами{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаками по возможности{/g} в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, он сам и все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} к урону оружием на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается в бою против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

Когда священник Адептус Министорум использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой гимн{/g} или {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Яростное выступление{/g}, он сам и все его союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} к урону оружием на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Этот бонус удваивается против демонов, псайкеров и ксеносов.

languages.text: Ministorum Rahibi her {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kullandığında hem Rahip'in kendisi hem de 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimleri, +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} daha fazla silah hasarı verir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Bu bonus; iblis, ruhsezer ve zenolara karşı iki katına çıkar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Ministorum Priest uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Priest themselves and their allies in a 5-cell radius deal +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} more weapon damage. This bonus is doubled against daemons, psykers, and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Zahit ile {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kabiliyetlerinin {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanında{/g} bulunan dost birimleri, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atışlarda{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarında{/g} +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirler.

Ministorum Rahibi her {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} veya {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g} kullandığında hem Rahip'in kendisi hem de 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimleri, +{uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} daha fazla silah hasarı verir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Bu bonus; iblis, ruhsezer ve zenolara karşı iki katına çıkar.

languages.text: The weapons of the priest and his allies the range of the 5 cell radius on bearer when use War Hymn and Furious Recital deal additional damage, equal to {uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} during one round. Against xenos,psyker and demons have double bonus.

traits.locale_text: The weapons of the priest and his allies the range of the 5 cell radius on bearer when use War Hymn and Furious Recital deal additional damage, equal to {uip|DamageBonus|10a6dc3267d14009a0e302927bb7fcfe} during one round. Against xenos,psyker and demons have double bonus.
